alert.note: Alert for Bradley; McMinn; Monroe; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 4:16PM CST until February 27 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cherokee County in southwestern North Carolina... Southeastern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Polk County in east Tennessee... South central McMinn County in east Tennessee... South central Monroe County in east Tennessee... * Until 600 PM EST. * At 516 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Etowah to near Cohutta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Benton, Ducktown, Wildwood Lake, William L. Davenport Refuge, Violet, Conasauga, Big Frog Mountain, Parksville, Turtletown and Copperhill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
